news-item.title: Calvary Austin T-Shirts
news-item.detail: T-shirts in red, green, blue, and black colors are available in adult and youth sizes. The cost is $10. Come to the Events Center to purchase your t-shirts today.

news-item.title: New Web Site
news-item.detail: As you have noticed by now, the Calvary Austin web site has a new look and fresh content. Find out more about the internet ministry, as well as the vision for the Calvary Austin web site.

news-item.title: YDC is Starting a New Year
news-item.detail:
"YDC" begins its new year Wednesday, Aug 21, at 7PM. It is a discipleship club for Wise Guys, Witnesses and Watchmen--boys and girls Kindergarten through Fifth grade. There is worship, Bible study, game and group times each week. Pick up a brochure at the Octopus in the lobby for more information.
Learn more...

news-item.title: Choir Auditions
news-item.detail: We will be holding auditions again for our new Worship Community. This is a contemporary choir that will participate in select Sunday services as well as special events. Please contact the church office to set up an interview and audition time.

news-item.title: Men's Evening Bible Study
news-item.detail: Mark your calendars! Bible study material will be available soon at the Events Center. Contact Andy Berke for more information.

news-item.title: Women's Morning and Evening Bible Study
news-item.detail: The Women's bible study starts up again this fall. For more information, visit their ministry home page.
